tool_description: The PubNub Network makes Real-time Communications Simple  with an easy API. Two Functions: Send/Receive (Publish/Subscribe). We provide a web-scale API for businesses to build scalable Data Push communication apps on Mobile, Tablet and Web. Bidirectional JSON. Ask for commit access - via Twitter: @pubnub - via IRC: #pubnub on FreeNode
name: PubNub Network
title: PubNub Network

api_list.name: History
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pubnub-pubnub.p.rapidapi.com/history/demo/my_channel/0/2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pubnub-pubnub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pubnub-pubnub.p.rapidapi.com/history/{subscribe_key}/{channel}/{callback}/{limit}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pubnub-pubnub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
test_endpoint: Hello from the PubNub Javascript SDK!

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pubnub-pubnub.p.rapidapi.com/time/{callback}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pubnub-pubnub.p.rapidapi.com"
